qrScanner.title: Scan QR Code
qrScanner.invalidFormatDesc: Please scan a valid worksheet QR code.
qrScanner.cameraErrorDesc: Unable to access your camera. Please check your permissions.

aiChat.title: AI Chat
aiChat.welcome: How can I help you with this worksheet page?
aiChat.apiKeyMissingDesc: Please set your Gemini API key first.
aiChat.aiErrorDesc: Failed to get response from AI. Please check your API key and try again.
aiChat.pdfErrorDesc: PDF data not available for AI chat.
aiChat.imageGenerationError: Failed to generate page image for AI analysis.

guidance.noParentGuidance: No parent guidance available for this page.
guidance.noStudentGuidance: No student guidance available for this page.

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.subtitle: Manage your account information and preferences
profile.emailCannotChange: Email cannot be changed. Contact support if you need to update your email.
profile.expiringWarning: Your access will expire soon. Please renew to continue using all features.
profile.expiredWarning: Your access has expired. Please renew to continue using the app.
profile.notActivatedWarning: Please activate your account to access all features and content.

parentalControls.title: Parental Controls
parentalControls.description: Manage PIN protection for parent guidance access
parentalControls.setupDescription: Set up PIN protection for parent guidance to ensure appropriate content access control.
parentalControls.protectContent: Protect access to parent guidance content
parentalControls.controlAccess: Control who can access parent mode
parentalControls.createPinDescription: Choose a 4-6 digit PIN to protect parent guidance access.
parentalControls.changePinDescription: Enter your current PIN and choose a new one.
parentalControls.protectionDescription: Require PIN to access parent guidance mode
parentalControls.enterPinDescription: Enter your PIN to access parent guidance.
parentalControls.pinTooShort: PIN must be at least 4 digits
parentalControls.tooManyAttempts: Too many failed attempts. Please try again in {{seconds}} seconds.
parentalControls.setupError: Failed to set up PIN. Please try again.

login.title: Sign In to Jooy
login.description: Enter your credentials to access your account
login.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
login.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
login.invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please check your credentials and try again.
login.emailNotConfirmed: Please check your email and click the confirmation link before signing in.

register.title: Create Your Account
register.description: Join Jooy to access interactive worksheets
register.fullNameMinLength: Full name must be at least 2 characters
register.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
register.passwordRequirements: Password does not meet all requirements
register.registrationSuccess: Registration successful! Please check your email to verify your account.

forgotPassword.title: Reset Your Password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password
forgotPassword.checkEmail: Check your email for password reset instructions
forgotPassword.sentTo: We've sent a password reset link to
forgotPassword.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address

resetPassword.linkExpired: This password reset link is invalid or has expired.
resetPassword.title: Set New Password
resetPassword.updateSuccess: Your password has been successfully updated. You can now sign in with your new password.
resetPassword.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
resetPassword.passwordRequirements: Password does not meet all requirements

apiKey.title: Gemini API Key Management
apiKey.description: Manage your Google Gemini API key for AI chat functionality.
apiKey.enterValidKey: Please enter a valid API key.
apiKey.formatDescription: Please ensure you've entered a valid Gemini API key. It should start with 'AIza' and be 39 characters long.
apiKey.saveSuccess: Your Gemini API key has been validated and saved successfully.
apiKey.keyInvalid: The API key appears to be invalid or expired.
apiKey.removeSuccess: Your Gemini API key has been removed from this device.
apiKey.privacyDescription: Your API key is stored locally on your device only. It's never sent to our servers - only directly to Google's Gemini API.
apiKey.getKey: Get API Key from Google AI Studio

pwa.description: Add to your home screen for quick access
